newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA-HANSA LIISING TO TAKE SYNDICATED LOAN.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA-HANSA LIISING TO TAKE SYNDICATED LOAN.

text.p: Hansa Liising, the leasing arm of Estonia's leading bank Hansapank, will take a syndicated loan of 40 million marks, Hansapank said on Monday.
The loan is guaranteed by Hansapank and handled by Bank Gesellschaft Berlin, Hansapank's head of interest rate products and financial risks, Erkki Raasuke, told Reuters.
Hansa Liising, which will use the resources to finance activities in Latvia and Lithuania, hopes to sign the loan agreement during the first week of August, he added.
Hansa Liising, Estonia's leasing market leader, is also active in the domestic commercial paper market.
